fsal_unlink.c

00004 
00014 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00015 #include "config.h"
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 #include "fsal.h"
00019 #include "fsal_internal.h"
00020 #include "fsal_convert.h"
00021 
00022 
00052 fsal_status_t FSAL_unlink(
00053     fsal_handle_t           * parentdir_handle,     /* IN */
00054     fsal_name_t             * p_object_name,        /* IN */
00055     fsal_op_context_t       * p_context,            /* IN */
00056     fsal_attrib_list_t      * parentdir_attributes  /* [IN/OUT ] */
00057 ){
00058   
00059   fsal_status_t st;
00060   int rc;
00061   fsal_handle_t obj_handle;
00062   
00063   /* sanity checks.
00064    * note : parentdir_attributes are optional.
00065    *        parentdir_handle is mandatory,
00066    *        because, we do not allow to delete FS root !
00067    */
00068   if ( !parentdir_handle || !p_context || !p_object_name)
00069     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_unlink);
00070   
00071   
00072   /* Action depends on the object type to be deleted.
00073    * To know that, we get fsal object handle.
00074    */
00075   st=FSAL_lookup (
00076         parentdir_handle,   /* IN */
00077         p_object_name,      /* IN */
00078         p_context,          /* IN */
00079         &obj_handle,        /* OUT */
00080         NULL );             /* IN/OUT */
00081 
00082   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(st)) Return( st.major ,st.minor , INDEX_FSAL_unlink );
00083 
00084   
00085   switch( obj_handle.obj_type ){
00086         
00087     case FSAL_TYPE_DIR   :
00088       
00089       /* remove a directory */
00090       
00091       TakeTokenFSCall();
00092       
00093       rc = hpss_RmdirHandle(
00094               &(parentdir_handle->ns_handle),
00095               p_object_name->name,
00096               &(p_context->credential.hpss_usercred));
00097       
00098       ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00099       
00100       /* The EEXIST error is actually an NOTEMPTY error. */
00101       
00102       if ( rc == EEXIST || rc == -EEXIST )
00103         Return( ERR_FSAL_NOTEMPTY, -rc, INDEX_FSAL_unlink );      
00104       else if (rc)
00105         Return(hpss2fsal_error(rc), -rc, INDEX_FSAL_unlink);
00106       
00107       break;            
00108             
00109     case FSAL_TYPE_LNK   :
00110     case FSAL_TYPE_FILE  :
00111       
00112       /* remove an object */
00113       
00114       TakeTokenFSCall();
00115       
00116       rc = hpss_UnlinkHandle(
00117               &(parentdir_handle->ns_handle),
00118               p_object_name->name,
00119               &(p_context->credential.hpss_usercred));
00120 
00121       ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00122       
00123       if (rc) Return(hpss2fsal_error(rc), -rc, INDEX_FSAL_unlink);
00124       
00125       break;      
00126       
00127     case FSAL_TYPE_JUNCTION  :
00128       /* remove a junction */
00129       
00130       TakeTokenFSCall();
00131       
00132       rc = hpss_JunctionDeleteHandle(
00133               &(parentdir_handle->ns_handle),
00134               p_object_name->name,
00135               &(p_context->credential.hpss_usercred));
00136       
00137       ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00138       
00139       if (rc) Return(hpss2fsal_error(rc), -rc, INDEX_FSAL_unlink);
00140 
00141       break;
00142       
00143       
00144     case FSAL_TYPE_FIFO :
00145     case FSAL_TYPE_CHR   :
00146     case FSAL_TYPE_BLK   :
00147     case FSAL_TYPE_SOCK  :
00148     default:
00149        DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_CRIT, "Unexpected object type : %d\n",
00150             obj_handle.obj_type );
00151        Return(ERR_FSAL_SERVERFAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_unlink);
00152     
00153   }
00154   
00155   
00156   /* Now, we get new attributes for the parent directory,
00157    * if they are asked.
00158    */
00159   
00160   if (parentdir_attributes){
00161     
00162     st = FSAL_getattrs( parentdir_handle, p_context , parentdir_attributes );
00163     
00164     /* On error, we set a flag in the returned attributes */
00165     
00166     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( st ) )
00167     {
00168       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( parentdir_attributes->asked_attributes );
00169       FSAL_SET_MASK( parentdir_attributes->asked_attributes,
00170           FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR );
00171     }
00172   }
00173   
00174   /* OK */
00175   Return(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_unlink);
00176   
00177 }
